### Thin Markets, Thick Premiums

#### Abstract {style="text-align: justify;"}
This study examines how market liquidity affects insurance premium pricing in specialized insurance markets. Using empirical analysis, we find that thinner markets lead to higher premiums, with significant implications for regulatory policy and market efficiency.

### Thin Markets, Thick Premiums
*Working Paper, 2025*

#### Abstract {style="text-align: justify;"}
This study examines how market liquidity affects insurance premium pricing in specialized insurance markets. Using empirical analysis, we find that thinner markets lead to higher premiums, with significant implications for regulatory policy and market efficiency.
